positive.review:
Other than the automatic pop-up asking you to purchase Crosshair X every time you launch, this application does exactly what it advertises for: putting a dot at the center of your screen.

If you happen to be addicted to a worthless piece of hot garbage game which refuses to give players something as simple as a freaking crosshair for the dumb reason of "immersive experience" that literally nobody cares, like Dead by Daylight, Crosshair V2 is an ideal and economical solution.

its nice .
feels  a bit weird  but it gets the job done for free

the crosshair looks sick but i cant use it inside fortnite and in halo it just 
wont launch
its quite alright but everytime you close the app it force feeds you crosshair X
its ok. I honestly would recommend Simple Sights, as it is free and stands in between crosshair V2 and crosshair X (the paid version) when it comes to quality.
Gets the job done. A bit confusing at first but easy to use when you get used to it and heavily customizable.
Хорошие приложение для прицела, но когда выкл пк или перезагрузил то прицел сбрасывается
very helpful if your broke and don't have money for crosshair x
What is there to say. Gives me a dot wherever TF I want the dot.
Makes me somewhat Less Dog piss at shooters
great if you dont want a custom crosshair
only use it when im on p^rn sim
i hate you JUST KIDDING I LOVE YOU!
nice little assist,helped me in dead by daylight would recomend a try

Other than the automatic pop-up asking you to purchase Crosshair X every time you launch, this application does exactly what it advertises for: putting a dot at the center of your screen.

If you happen to be addicted to a worthless piece of hot garbage game which refuses to give players something as simple as a freaking crosshair for the dumb reason of "immersive experience" that literally nobody cares, like Dead by Daylight, Crosshair V2 is an ideal and economical solution.

wont launch
its quite alright but everytime you close the app it force feeds you crosshair X
its ok. I honestly would recommend Simple Sights, as it is free and stands in between crosshair V2 and crosshair X (the paid version) when it comes to quality.
Gets the job done. A bit confusing at first but easy to use when you get used to it and heavily customizable.
Its a really good crosshair app I use it for many games and a plus is it's free

played trident survival v2 with it
killed a guy with a bow
died 
killed another guy with a bow
found a m4
killed a guy with the m4
got stacked.
left the game.
slept.
woke up in the morning
launched crosshair v2
opened the game
got raided.
spent 1k+hrs on this app 10/10
handy for P2 in rust and other guns with bad default scopes
Used it for my Halo LASO runs. Works fine. I don't know much about crosshair software and comparing them, but I can at least say that for any traditional usage it works like you'd expect it to.
Best game really good and good crosshairs
It's a good app for free and there isn't much options as Crosshair X but in my opinion it's still good.

After using it for some time, I bought crosshair X.
Paid thingy works better and is cheap but if you don't need too much, crosshair v2 should be enough.
Very good app for a good selection of crosshairs. Helps a lot with aim practice and works good on AimLabs

it alright the crosshair selection is very limited but it is good im looking forward to getting crosshair x soon

6/10
very useful for pc players, especially in fps (first person shooter) games <3
really good for any game i just use it for fortnite and it is really good and amazing for getting  good aim and customizing
Very good for playing Fortnite and other games that have a bad crosshair. My friends called me a hacker because of this software. The one I use is the cross in white color.

Left 4 dead 2

i suck at aiming so i downloaded this... and i still suck at aiming but i thank the crosshair for helping me suck less
For a free crosshair app, it's pretty good, all the crosshairs are good and customiseable.
Хорошие приложение для прицела, но когда выкл пк или перезагрузил то прицел сбрасывается
helps you in game that the crosshair is moved with recoil
every crosshair besides the medium sized white dot SUCKS.
lowkey a good app but i would recommend crosshair x

negative.review:
its just kind of wierdly bloated for it being a simple free thing that really shouldnt be i guess?
dont need this anymore sience my new "odys" monitor can do it built in
like a no name budget king brand as far as i got it cause i never heard of them before i got a 1080p 144hz hdr 400 screen for like 60 bucks or what it was new
not with AS many options but it just like
works i guess
and doesnt need me to run an extra program that is being a bit too sus and annoying for my taste
Opens at start of launch no matter what, and forces you to their steam page when closed
doesnt work on full screen applications i do not recommend
Just spend the extra $3 to get Crosshair X it is far better than this junk

Le Bomboclat
just get yourself crossair x its a lot better
crossover from ms store 10x better than this trash
all i have to say is i wont let me open the app so i might just never put this app on my steam or just by the v2 one
Way to hard to re alighn
i cant get rid of it
when ever you close it, it advertises, jew.
bad
shit
i REALLY dislike that everytime i close the app, it sends me to the steam page to buy the full thing, its annoying and not needed
